items.title: Anker SOLIX winter weekend flash sale drops expanded C1000 gen 1 power station + bag to $729 low, more from $429
items.summary:
As part of its soon-to-end Winter Sale, Anker SOLIX has also launched a 72-hour weekend flash sale that will close out its current savings event, with some notable lows sticking around from the previous flash sale on the F2600 2,560Wh power station and its larger F3800 3,840Wh counterpart. Starting on the lower end of the pricing, you can currently find Anker’s SOLIX C1000 Gen 1 Portable Power Station bundled with an expansion battery and a water-resistant bag for $729 shipped, which beats out its bagless option at Amazon by $141. This package would fetch you $1,898 without any discounts, and hasn’t been featured like this in past sales, instead being split into two separate bundles. Considering the expanded setup has gone as low as $699, and the water-resistant bag on its own has gone as low as $80 (meaning $779 total with their best pricing), this bundle with all three certainly seems to be the lowest price you could score them with, complete with $1,169 savings. There’s also the newer and more compact C1000 Gen 2 Power Station down at $429 shipped, and matching its Amazon pricing. Head below for the full lineup.

more…

items.title: Put your spare M.2 SSD to use with this transparent USB-C enclosure for just $15 (Reg. $25)
items.summary:
ORICO Transparent M.2 2280 NVMe SSD Enclosure

Buy for $15 (Reg. $25)

Clip the on-page 40% off coupon.

What we love

With SSD prices skyrocketing, you might want to put your spare M.2 drives to good use, and this enclosure will let you do just that. Once assembled, it delivers USB-C speeds of up to 10Gb/s via a USB 3.2 Gen 2 connection. It also stands out with a transparent design that looks far more interesting than the usual plain enclosures.

Baseus 100W 6.6-foot USB-C cable with LED

Buy for $9 (Reg. $19)

Enter promo code 59NBVSJD for $5.44 off.

What we love

One of the highlights of this Baseus USB-C cable is the built-in LED display on the connector, which shows real-time power output as you charge. It’s a 6.6-foot braided cable that supports up to 100W fast charging, and handles data speeds up to 480MB/s. It’a an easy recommendation if you’re looking to buy a new cable to charge your devices.

items.title: Pre-orders now live: Nintendo announces release date for new physical Talking Flower collectible
items.summary:
Update: Pre-orders are now live via GameStop on Nintendo’s new Talking Flower at $34.99.

Update: Nintendo has also announced that Super Mario Bros. Wonder – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Meetup in Bellabel Park is launching on on March 26 with new amiibo (Elephant Mario, Captain Toad and Talking Flower, Poplin and Prince Florian). Trailer below.

As part of the Mario Bros. 40th anniversary, Nintendo announced an upcoming expansion for Super Mario Bros. Wonder that is set to release sometime this spring, but it is also releasing a physical collectible known as Talking Flower too. Today it launched an overview trailer for its adorable new Talking Flower, serving up some details on some of its (sort of) smart capabilities and a release date – pre-orders are set to go live today.

items.title: Keep food/drinks cool or frozen in cars, RVs, boats, more with BougeRV’s 53-quart portable fridge/freezer at $236
items.summary:
Through the official BougeRV Amazon storefront, you can pick up the brand’s 12V 53-Quart Portable Refrigerator/Freezer at $235.99 shipped, or get it with a cover for $54 more. Going for $310 at full price, we’ve mostly seen it hanging down around $250 during the last few months of holidays, with occasional dips to $240 and the first appearance of this same rate post-Cyber Monday, followed by its second appearance as a more short-term Lightning deal. Now, you’re getting a third chance to score it at the best price we have tracked over the last year, thanks to the return of this $74 markdown, making it a more budget-friendly model than its newer dual-zone and wheeled counterpart that is sitting $114 higher, which does still come in lower than some premium brand models.

items.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI added more than $1B in annual recurring revenue in the past month "just from our API business" (Lee Chong Ming/Business Insider)
items.summary:
Lee Chong Ming / Business Insider:
Sam Altman says OpenAI added more than $1B in annual recurring revenue in the past month “just from our API business”  —  - OpenAI has made more than $1 billion a month from something other than ChatGPT.  — That revenue comes “just from our API business,” Sam Altman said.
